title: Peer Feedback Competency Enhancement Course in Multicultural Nursing Education Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge, basic clinical skills, and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to develop feedback competencies for international nursing education environments, prioritizing interaction experiences with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can improve nursing simulation performance by 20% using a structured framework for effectively exchanging peer feedback.
Learners achieve a 15% or higher score improvement in pre-post comparisons using the FOS scale, which measures positive attitudes in terms of feedback utility and self-efficacy.
Learners can improve team project outcomes by applying feedback strategies that consider three or more cultural differences.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
